message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9500.  It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. I'm willing to make a compromise, but I'm on a tight budget.

Bob, I understand you're on a budget, but $8500 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit further to $9000, which is a fair price considering the value of the product.  I'm open to hearing your final offer, but I'm not going to go any lower than that.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9250. Can we meet at this price?
